item.description:
Welcome, all, to Revolve's famous Greatest Bar gathering! 

Where: Greatest Bar, 4th Floor

What:

  • Friendly Networking among Business People and Entrepreneurs 
  • Free appetizers
  • Cash Bar

When: 6pm until you choose to leave!

Price: FREE

The Revolve Nation's Boston Entrepreneurs Network is the largest community of entrepreneurs and business owners in the city of Boston, offering networking, discussion groups, seminars, business plan hot-seats, and more!

Join us here, where professionals and entrepreneurs meet in mutual support of business to network, socialize, learn, and promote a thriving community of entrepreneurs.  

SPONSORS: Revolve, Inc.: www.revolvethis.com

Exemplar Law: www.exemplarcompanies.com

See you soon!
item.how_to_find_us: Come to the Greatest Bar on Friend St. near North Station and go to the Fourth Floor!
item.name: Revolve Nation Greatest Bar Party!
